thread.section_title: Novotel Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Location. Friendly English speaking staff.
thread.title_full: Good Location. Friendly English speaking staff. - Review of Novotel Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: Elissa B
title: Good Location. Friendly English speaking staff.
text:
This hotel is very easily to locate from the CDG Paris airport. The train station at the airport goes directly to Chaulet then line 1 to Esplanade de la Defence. (2 minute walk to hotel from station.)
Metro line costs â‚¬1.70 to central Paris, Eiffel Tower, Lovre etc.. 10 minutes on the train.
$7.70 pp to DisneyLand on the RER train.
Comfy beds, spacious rooms and very good views. Free Wifi with good connection. Bath and shower. TV (no English channels). Room safe. sofa bed.
Only downside: Cleaner came in at 8:00 in the morning so we remembered to use the not disturb sign.
Restaurant was ok and bar/cafe was ok but staff very friendly.
Vending machines for drinks and snacks.
